title: Judi Dench Texts Kevin Spacey and Says ‘I Imagine’ Harvey Weinstein ‘Has Done His Time’
summary: Judi Dench has commented on her current feelings toward Kevin Spacey and Harvey Weinstein, who each played a part in the Oscar-winning actress’ life and career before their respective #MeToo allegations. Spacey, who starred alongside Dench in the 2001 film “The Shipping News,” comforted her after h…
